import React, {useEffect, useState} from "react"; export type InfoProps = { bpk : string, cName : string, cCell : string, cJumin : string, cMail : string, cPost : string, cAddr1 : string, cAddr2 : string, cJobN : string, cCarCc : string, cUseN : string, cJobLocal : string, cMoney : string, cDrink : string, cWeekD : string, cOneD : string, cSmoke : string, cWeekS : string, cOneS : string, cHeight : string, cWeight : string, cBank : string, cAccount : string, cPayDt : string, } const CarNumInput = (props : {info : InfoProps, setInfo : React.Dispatch>}) => { const [carNum, setCarNum] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { props.setInfo((prevState) => { return { ...prevState, cCarCc: carNum } }); }, [carNum]); return (
운행차량 배기량(cc)
) => setCarNum(e.target.value)} className='input' placeholder='배기량을 입력하세요(N cc)'/>
이륜차 운전경력
) => setCarNum(e.target.value)} className='input' placeholder='차량번호를 입력해주세요'/>
) } export default CarNumInput;
